paragraphs.title: Create table "hotels"
paragraphs.text:
%spark

import scala.util.Try
import scala.xml._

case class Hotel(name : String, street : String, locality : String, postalCode : String, region : String, country : String, 
    avgRating: Double, room: Double, cleanliness: Double)

val path = "/data/tripadvisor/json/9*.json"
val hotelDF = sqlContext.read.json(path)

//val hotels = hotelDF.select("Reviews.Ratings.Overall", "HotelInfo.Name", "HotelInfo.Address")
val hotels = hotelDF.select("HotelInfo.Name", "HotelInfo.Address", "Reviews.Ratings.Overall", "Reviews.Ratings.Rooms", "Reviews.Ratings.Cleanliness")
.map(hotel => Try({
    val xml = XML.loadString(hotel.getString(1))
    val street = (xml \\ "span").filter(_.attribute("property").exists(_.text == "v:street-address")).text
    val locality = (xml \\ "span").filter(_.attribute("property").exists(_.text == "v:locality")).text
    val postalCode = (xml \\ "span").filter(_.attribute("property").exists(_.text == "v:postal-code")).text
    val region = (xml \\ "span").filter(_.attribute("property").exists(_.text == "v:region")).text
    var country = (xml \\ "span").filter(_.attribute("property").exists(_.text == "v:country-name")).text
    country = if (country == "") "USA" else country
    
    //{"Ratings": {"Service": "4", "Cleanliness": "4", "Overall": "5.0", "Value": "5", "Sleep Quality": "5", "Rooms": "4", "Location": "5"}
    val overall: Seq[String] = hotel.getSeq(2)
    val ratingsOverall = overall.map(s => Try(s.toDouble)).filter(_.isSuccess).map(_.get)
    val avgRating = (0.0 /: ratingsOverall){_ + _} / ratingsOverall.length
    
    val rooms: Seq[String] = hotel.getSeq(3)
    val ratingsRooms = rooms.map(s => Try(s.toInt)).filter(_.isSuccess).map(_.get)
    val avgRoom = (0.0 /: ratingsRooms){_ + _} / ratingsRooms.length
    
    val clean: Seq[String] = hotel.getSeq(4)
    val ratingsClean = clean.map(s => Try(s.toInt)).filter(_.isSuccess).map(_.get)
    val avgClean = (0.0 /: ratingsClean){_ + _} / ratingsClean.length
    
    Hotel(hotel.getString(0), street, locality, postalCode, region, country, avgRating, avgRoom, avgClean)
}))
.filter(_.isSuccess).map(_.get)

hotels.toDF().registerTempTable("hotels")

Notation des hôtels (affichage avec Angular + partage de données entre paragraphes + visualisation graphique)

result.msg: Notation des hôtels (affichage avec Angular + partage de données entre paragraphes + visualisation graphique)

paragraphs.title: 1- Requêtes + angularBind(  "countries", query result    ) => Spark -> Angular
paragraphs.text:
%spark

val global = sqlContext.sql("select avg(avgRating) from hotels").map(r => ("All countries", r.getDouble(0))).collect
val countries = sqlContext.sql("select country, avg(avgRating) from hotels group by country").map(r => (r.getString(0), r.getDouble(1))).collect

// Here, bind the countries variable to be able to reuse it in AngularJS (below)
z.angularUnbind("countries")
z.angularBind("countries", global ++ countries)

paragraphs.title: 2- Angular : use "countries" + angularBind ( "selectedCountry" ) => Angular -> Spark
paragraphs.text:
%angular

Note moyenne (disponible pour {{countries.length-1}} pays)

{{countries[selectedCountry]._2 | number}}

paragraphs.title: 3- use "selectedCountry" => Angular -> SparkSQL
paragraphs.text:
%sql

SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = '${selectedCountry}' AND locality != '' ORDER BY avgRating DESC LIMIT 5
